title: Out Of Nowhere
description: Hailey Jenkins life was settled, or so she thought. She was happily married, livingout her life's dream of becoming an author on her farm. But everything she thought she knew to be her truth changed the moment she heard his footsteps in the gravel. Suddenly, faced with decisions that would alter her world forever, Hailey is forced to realize that no matter what she chooses, there is no right answer. Living two lives, feeling like two different people and loving two different men for different reasons.â€‹It was enough to wreck someone.
author: Claire Whitmore
